posts.title: KTM 160 Duke launched in India at ₹1.85 lakh
posts.excerpt: KTM enters the sub-200cc streetfighter battle with an aggressive new 160 Duke.
posts.content: KTM has introduced the 160 Duke in India at an ex-showroom price of ₹1.85 lakh, targeting rivals like the Yamaha MT-15. The bike features modern hardware and sharp styling. This post summarizes the key launch details and links to reputable sources.
posts.author: Throttle Path Desk

posts.title: Jett Lawrence clinches 2025 AMA Pro Motocross 450 title
posts.excerpt: Dominant Unadilla performance seals the 450 crown for the Aussie star.
posts.content: At Unadilla MX in New York, Jett Lawrence completed another commanding 1–1 to secure the 2025 AMA Pro Motocross 450 title. This recap points to official press and major outlet coverage.
posts.author: Race Desk

posts.title: Moto3: Valentin Perrone takes maiden pole in Austria
posts.excerpt: Red Bull KTM Tech3 rider claims his first Grand Prix pole at the Red Bull Ring.
posts.content: Valentin Perrone earned his first career Moto3 pole position at the Austrian GP, marking the first Moto3 pole for Argentina since 2021.
posts.author: GP Desk

posts.title: Norton ends Project Zen electric superbike
posts.excerpt: Manufacturer halts its halo electric program citing demand headwinds.
posts.content: Norton Motorcycles has reportedly pulled the plug on its Project Zen electric superbike program amid weak demand and shifting priorities.
posts.author: Industry Desk

posts.title: BSA Bantam 350 debuts at Bike Shed Moto Show
posts.excerpt: Retro-styled 350 targets the hot entry classic segment.
posts.content: BSA unveiled the Bantam 350 at London’s Bike Shed Moto Show, positioning it as a rival to Royal Enfield Hunter 350.
posts.author: Throttle Path Desk
